Scripts.OnEnter:
self.closeButton:Show() if not self:IsDragging() then local T = Angleur_Translate GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_BOTTOMLEFT", 45) if AngleurCharacter.sleeping == false then local colorBlu = CreateColor(0.61, 0.85, 0.92) local colorWhite = CreateColor(1, 1, 1) GameTooltip:AddLine(T["Angleur Visual Button"], 0.6, 0.85, 0.91) GameTooltip:AddLine(T["Shows what your next key press
will do. Not meant to be clicked."], 1, 1, 1, true) GameTooltip:AddLine(" ") if AngleurConfig.chosenMethod == "doubleClick" then GameTooltip:AddLine(T["Fishing Mode: " .. colorBlu:WrapTextInColorCode("Double Click
")], 1, 1, 1) elseif AngleurConfig.chosenMethod == "oneKey" then GameTooltip:AddLine(T["Fishing Mode: " .. colorBlu:WrapTextInColorCode("One Key")], 1, 1, 1) if AngleurConfig.angleurKey then GameTooltip:AddLine(colorWhite:WrapTextInColorCode(T["Key set to "]) .. AngleurConfig.angleurKey .. "
 ") else GameTooltip:AddLine(T["One-Key NOT SET! To set,
open config menu with:"], 1, 0, 0, true) GameTooltip:AddLine("/angleur") GameTooltip:AddLine(T[" or
"], 1, 1, 1, true) GameTooltip:AddLine("/angang
 ") end end GameTooltip:AddLine(T["Right Click to temporarily put Angleur to sleep. zzz..."], 0.8, 0.8, 0.8, true) elseif AngleurCharacter.sleeping == true then GameTooltip:AddLine(T["Sleeping. Zzz...
"], 1, 1, 1, true) GameTooltip:AddLine(T["
Right-Click"]) GameTooltip:AddLine(T["
to wake Angleur!"], 1, 1, 1, true) self.sleep:SetPoint("TOPRIGHT", "GameTooltip", "TOPRIGHT", -15, 0) self.sleep:Show() end GameTooltip:Show() end
Scripts.OnLeave: if not self:IsMouseOver() then self.closeButton:Hide() end GameTooltip:Hide() if self.sleep:IsShown() then self.sleep:Hide() end
Scripts.OnClick:
if button == "RightButton" and down == true then if InCombatLockdown() then print(Angleur_Translate["Can't change sleep state in combat."]) return end local colorBlu = CreateColor(0.61, 0.85, 0.92) if AngleurCharacter.sleeping == true then AngleurCharacter.sleeping = false Angleur_SetSleep() Angleur_EquipAngleurSet(true) print(Angleur_Translate[colorBlu:WrapTextInColorCode("Angleur: ") .. "Awake."]) elseif AngleurCharacter.sleeping == false then AngleurCharacter.sleeping = true Angleur_SetSleep() Angleur_UnequipAngleurSet() print(Angleur_Translate[colorBlu:WrapTextInColorCode("Angleur: ") .. "Sleeping."]) end
end

Scripts.OnLeave: if not self:GetParent():IsMouseOver() then self:Hide() end

Scripts.OnMouseDown: self:Raise() if Angleur.visual:IsShown() then Angleur.visual:Raise() end
Scripts.OnDragStart: self:StartMoving() if Angleur.visual:IsShown() then Angleur.visual:Raise() end
Scripts.OnDragStop: self:StopMovingOrSizing() if Angleur.visual:IsShown() then Angleur.visual:Raise() end
Scripts.OnShow: if AngleurCharacter.sleeping == true then self.wakeUpButton:Show() self.wakeUpButton.sleep:Show() end

Scripts.OnEnter:
if not self:IsDragging() then local T = Angleur_Translate GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_BOTTOMLEFT", 45) GameTooltip:SetPadding(200, 300) local colorBlu = CreateColor(0.61, 0.85, 0.92) local colorPurple = CreateColor(0.64, 0.3, 0.71) GameTooltip:AddLine(T["One-Key Fishing Mode"], 1.0, 0.82, 0.0, true) GameTooltip:AddLine(T[colorBlu:WrapTextInColorCode("Cast ") .. ", " .. colorBlu:WrapTextInColorCode("Reel ") .. ", use " .. colorPurple:WrapTextInColorCode("Toys") .. ", " .. colorBlu:WrapTextInColorCode(" Items and Configured Macros ") .. "using 
one button."], 1, 1, 1, true) GameTooltip:AddLine(T["Set your desired key by: "], 0.6, 0.85, 0.91, true) GameTooltip:AddLine(T["Clicking on the button
that appears below
once this option is selected."], 1, 1, 1, true) GameTooltip:Show() end

Scripts.OnShow: if AngleurConfig.chosenMethod == "oneKey" and not AngleurConfig.angleurKey then Angleur.configPanel.tab1.contents.fishingMethod.oneKey.contents.angleurKey.warning:Show() end

Scripts.OnEnter: if not self:IsDragging() then local T = Angleur_Translate GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_BOTTOMRIGHT", -45) GameTooltip:SetPadding(400, 300) GameTooltip:AddLine(T["Double-Click Fishing Mode"], 1.0, 0.82, 0.0, true) GameTooltip:AddLine(T["Fish, Reel, cast Toys, Items and Macros using double mouse clicks!\n"], 1, 1, 1, true) GameTooltip:Show() end

Scripts.OnClick: if AngleurConfig.visualHidden == true then Angleur_VisualReset(self, -75, -2, true) Angleur_CreateWeaponSwapFrames() self:Hide() end
if InCombatLockdown() then return end ToggleCharacter("PaperDollFrame")
if InCombatLockdown() then return end if not MacroFrame then C_AddOns.LoadAddOn("Blizzard_MacroUI") MacroFrame_Show() elseif not MacroFrame:IsShown() then MacroFrame_Show() end

Scripts.OnLoad:
local problemsbackground = self:CreateTexture("$parent_Texture", "ARTWORK") problemsbackground:SetTexture("Interface/AddOns/Angleur/images/extratoysproblems.png") problemsbackground:SetPoint("CENTER") problemsbackground:SetSize("250", "48")
local problemstext = self:CreateFontString("$parent_Text", "ARTWORK", "Game15Font") problemstext:SetPoint("CENTER") local color = CreateColor(1.0, 0.82, 0.0) problemstext:SetText(color:WrapTextInColorCode(Angleur_Translate["Having Problems?"]))
Scripts.OnEnter:
if not self:IsDragging() then local T = Angleur_Translate GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_BOTTOMLEFT", 45) GameTooltip:SetPadding(400, 300) GameTooltip:AddLine(T["Not every toy will work!"], 1.0, 0.82, 0.0, true) GameTooltip:AddLine(T["Extra Toys is a feature meant to provide flexible user customization, but not every toy is created the same. Targeted toys, toys that silence you, remote controlled toys etc might mess with your fishing routine. Test them out, experiment and have fun!
"], 1, 1, 1, true) GameTooltip:AddLine(T["Fun toy recommendations from mod author, Legolando:"], 0.6, 0.85, 0.91, true) GameTooltip:AddLine("", 1, 1, 1, true) GameTooltip:AddLine(T["1) Tents such as Gnoll Tent to protect yourself from the sun as you fish.
2) Transformation toys such as Burning Defender's Medallion.
3) Seating items like pillows so you can fish comfortably.
4) Darkmoon whistle if you want to be annoying.
And other whacky combinations!"], 1, 1, 1, true) GameTooltip:Show() end

Scripts.OnClick: if InCombatLockdown() then print(Angleur_Translate["Can't change sleep state in combat."]) return end AngleurCharacter.sleeping = false Angleur_SetSleep() Angleur_EquipAngleurSet(true)
if InCombatLockdown() then return end self:Disable() Angleur_CreateEquipmentSet() Angleur_AddToEquipmentSet()
Scripts.OnEnter:
GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_BOTTOMLEFT", 70) local colorWhite = CreateColor(1, 1, 1) GameTooltip:AddLine(Angleur_Translate["Beta: " .. colorWhite:WrapTextInColorCode("If you are having trouble,
try resetting the set by clicking
the reset button then refreshing
the UI with ") .. "/reload."], 1.0, 0.82, 0.0) GameTooltip:Show()

Scripts.OnLoad: tinsert(UISpecialFrames, self:GetName()) self.TitleText:SetText(Angleur_Translate["Angleur Warning: Plater"]) self.mainText:SetText(Angleur_Translate["Make sure this box is checked!"]) self.otherText:SetText(Angleur_Translate["Located in Plater->Advanced->General Settings.\n\nOtherwise Angleur wont be able to reel fish in."]) local colorYellow = CreateColor(1.0, 0.82, 0.0) self.okayButton:SetText(colorYellow:WrapTextInColorCode(Angleur_Translate["Okay"]))
Scripts.OnHide: if C_AddOns.IsAddOnLoaded("Plater") then Plater.OpenOptionsPanel(23, true) end
